name: Cable Cross-over
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your back to a cable machine, holding onto the handles of the device with your arms straight.
2. Hold one handle in each hand, keeping your elbows extended and your forearms parallel to the floor.
3. Keeping your back tight, lift the cable outwards by pulling your hands towards your shoulders until your elbows are high.
4. Lower the cable to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions before switching arms.
short_summary: Cable cross-overs target multiple muscles in the upper body.
